description: This file configures URL routing for a Django project, including the API schema views, Swagger UI, and ReDoc documentation endpoints.

methods.name: get_full_url
methods.description: Constructs the full URL (including scheme, host, and port) from the request object, considering proxy headers.

methods.name: dynamic_schema_view
methods.description: Dynamically generates and returns the Swagger UI for API documentation, using the request's full URL.
